Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.12.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.12.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.12.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-44487
